AD.name: Result Count
AD.description: Specifies the number of results to request from each source

AD.name: Imagery Providers
AD.description: List of imagery providers to use. Valid types are: OSM (OpenStreetMap), AGM (ArcGisMap), BM (BingMap), WMS (WebMapService), WMT (WebMapTile), TMS (TileMapService), GE (GoogleEarth). Example: {"type": "WMS", "url": "http://example.com", "layers": ["layer1", "layer2"], "parameters": {"FORMAT": "image/png", "VERSION": "1.1.1"}, "alpha": 0.5}

AD.name: Terrain Provider
AD.description: Terrain provider to use for height data. Valid types are: CT (CesiumTerrain), AGS (ArcGisImageServer), VRW (VRTheWorld). Example: {"type": "CT", "url": "http://example.com"}

AD.name: Map Projection
AD.description: Projection of imagery providers (e.g. EPSG:3857, EPSG:4326)

AD.name: Bing Maps Key
AD.description: Bing Maps API key. This should only be set if you are using Bing Maps Imagery or Terrain Providers.

AD.name: Connection Timeout
AD.description: Specifies the client-side connection timeout in milliseconds.

AD.name: Source Poll Interval
AD.description: Specifies the interval to poll for sources in milliseconds.

AD.name: Show Sign In
AD.description: Allow Sign In to Search UI and welcome notice. Enable this if the Search UI is protected.

AD.name: Show Tasks
AD.description: Show task menu area for long running actions.

AD.name: Show Gazetteer
AD.description: Show gazetteer for searching place names.

AD.name: Show Uploader
AD.description: Show upload menu for adding new record.

AD.name: Use External Authentication
AD.description: Use an external authentication point, such as IdP

AD.name: Disable Cache
AD.description: Locally cached results will not be returned in search results.

AD.name: Type Name Mapping
AD.description: Mapping of display names to content types in the form name=type.

AD.name: Read Only Metacard Attributes
AD.description: List of metacard attributes that are read-only. NOTE: the provided values will be evaluated as JavaScript regular expressions when matched against metacard attributes.

AD.name: Summary Metacard Attributes
AD.description: List of metacard attributes to display in the summary view.

AD.name: Result Preview Metacard Attributes
AD.description: List of metacard attributes to display in the result preview.

AD.name: Attribute Aliases
AD.description: List of attribute aliases. Example 'title=Title'

AD.name: Hidden Attributes
AD.description: List of attributes to be hidden. NOTE: the provided values will be evaluated as JavaScript regular expressions when matched against metacard attributes.

AD.name: Query Schedule Frequencies
AD.description: Custom list of schedule frequencies in seconds. This will override the frequency list in the query schedule tab. Leave this empty to use the frequency list on the Catalog UI.

AD.name: Allow Editing
AD.description: Allow editing capability to be visible in the UI

AD.name: Result Page Size
AD.description: Specifies the number of results allowed per page on the client-side.
